description: Josh and Ryan have only been friends for a minute. Josh moved down to Florida a few months ago and Ryan spotted him at the mall and, unbeknownst to Josh, thought he was hot. Apparently Josh had no idea Ryan was gay. And Ryan was taking his sweet time coming out to him. He knew it would prolly be easier to seduce Josh if Josh knew him better, and, it worked. Not gonna give away all Ryan's straight boy seduction skills---but they work!
title: Playing The Field
